recipesJson.name: Stay Berried RainbowPudding
recipesJson.author: diy_discord
recipesJson.description:
Red Team Mixer's Showdown 6/2/19 Eyemakepizza, Silky, Jaximus_1

The Golden Ticket to a proper Pudding. A thick blend of candied berries swirled into a velvety rich vanilla pudding. So good you'll lick the walls of the bowl clean!

https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/bvpjzm/mixer_showdown_4_newbie_booster/

Come join us on Discord! https://discord.gg/ufVTyAQ
